derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from northern Italian articiocco, from Spanish alcarchofa, from Arabic al-ḵaršūa

entry.def: Artichokes or globe artichokes are round green vegetables that have fleshy leaves arranged like the petals of a flower.

means.word_mean: 1. Mediterranean thistlelike plant widely cultivated for its large edible flower head
2. a thistle-like flower head with edible fleshy leaves and heart
